attributes.action:
Stop the ban on XL bully 
Ban the owners that can’t control them!
attributes.additional_details: The ban is tearing apart families , the amount of kids that adore their 4 legged friends and will be distraught without them , the amount of mental health cases are going to rise . This needs to stop
attributes.background:
Reconsider the xl bully ban and put a stop on it . The amount of kind, gentle dosile dogs being punished for other immature and irresponsible owners . It isn’t fair that everyone is being punished when not everyone is at fault 
They sit for us we will stand for them

rejection.details:
We have these similar petitions already open which you may wish to sign: 

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Bring back a Dog Licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650
